name: Alternate Reality (itch)
description:
Fly and face psychedelic perils as you meditate in the precious,
angelic voice of singer Laura Pieri.

What is this wondrous music that ripples through the cosmos? Is it nostalgia, or perhaps remorse for past decisions? Is it a longing, an unfulfillable longing for a lost love? Or maybe just a beautiful, harmonious melody that accompanies you on this short and sweet Shoot 'em up journey.

Try your luck and test your agility to reach the highest high-score while equipping yourself with great powers with the help of our singer.

  • Soar around with your Keyboard Arrows or WASD;
  • Fire your Special Blast with Space Key;
  • Try using your Mouse as well!
